anya-e0811n:12: Saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ vāṇī, mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0811n:16: Tathāpi tu vaḷañjenti, suddhamāgadhikā na te.
anya-e0811n:25: Kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā, yesaṃ natthi garūni’ha;
anya-e0811n:32: Yena tosenti viññū ye, tattha pya’vihitā’darā.
anya-e0811n:34: Bandho ca nāma sadda,tthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
anya-e0811n:35: Pajja gajja vimissānaṃ, bhedenā’yaṃ tidhā bhave.
anya-e0811n:37: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
anya-e0811n:40: Anavajjaṃ mukhambhoja ‘‘ambhoja’’nti padaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi, vārijavācakaṃ, sakkaṭaganthato anītaṃ, manavajjā ca bhāratī;
anya-e0811n:41: Alaṅkatā’va sobhante, kiṃ nu te nira’laṅkatā?
anya-e0811n:44: Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
anya-e0811n:53: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
anya-e0811n:56: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ?
anya-e0811n:61: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
anya-e0811n:79: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0811n:81: Visesya madhikaṃ yenā, jhattha metaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0811n:85: Kiliṭṭhaṃ taṃ yathā tāya, so’ya māliṅgyate piyā.
anya-e0811n:94: Yamakaṃ tañca pādāna, mādi, majjha, nta, gocaraṃ.
anya-e0811n:105: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
anya-e0811n:110: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sa hitaṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0811n:118: Yamakaṃ taṃ pahelī paheḷi (ka.) ca, nekantamadhurāni’ti;
anya-e0811n:124: Ya dappatīta mānīya, vattabbaṃ neyya māhu taṃ;
anya-e0811n:125: Yathā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0811n:127: Nedisaṃ bahu maññanti, sabbe sabbattha viññuno;
anya-e0811n:130: Siyā visesanāpekkhaṃ, yaṃ taṃ patvā visesanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:131: Sātthakaṃ taṃ yathā taṃ so, bhiyyo passati cakkhunā.
anya-e0811n:133: Hīnaṃ kare visesyaṃ yaṃ, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0811n:137: Yathā hi vande buddhassa, pādapaṅkeruhaṃ pi ca.
anya-e0811n:140: Saddato atthato vuttaṃ, yattha bhiyyopi vuccati;
anya-e0811n:141: Ta mekatthaṃ yathā’bhāti, vārido vārido ayaṃ.
anya-e0811n:148: Kāpi paññā, kopi paguṇo, pakatīpi aho tava.
anya-e0811n:157: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃnvi’daṃ?
anya-e0811n:160: Tampi gāmmaṃ tya’bhimataṃ, yathā yābhavato piyā.
anya-e0811n:162: Vuttesu sūcite ṭṭhāne, padacchedo bhave yati;
anya-e0811n:163: Yaṃ tāya hīnaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, yatihīnanti sā pana.
anya-e0811n:169: Taṃ name sirasā cāmi, karavaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ;
anya-e0811n:170: Sakalāpi disā siñca, tiva soṇṇarasehi yo.
anya-e0811n:172: Saro sandhimhi pubbanto, viya lope vibhattiyā;
anya-e0811n:179: Name taṃ sirasā sabbo, pamā’tītaṃ tathāgataṃ;
anya-e0811n:180: Yassa lokaggataṃ patta, sso’pamā na hi yujjati.
anya-e0811n:182: Munindaṃ taṃ sadā vandā, mya’nantamati muttamaṃ;
anya-e0811n:183: Yassa paññā ca mettā ca, nissīmāti vijambhati.
anya-e0811n:187: Paṇamāmi jinaṃ taṃ pa, varaṃ varaguṇā’layaṃ.
anya-e0811n:190: Khettaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, desaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0811n:196: Gāviputto balibaddho, tiṇaṃ khādī pivī jalaṃ.
anya-e0811n:198: Bandhe pharusatā yattha, taṃ bandhapharusaṃ yathā;
anya-e0811n:199: Kharā khilā parikkhīṇā, khette khittaṃ phalatya’laṃ.
anya-e0811n:207: Bhoga, saggādi, nibbāna, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
anya-e0811n:211: Mayekasmiṃ guṇā sabbe, yato samuditā ahuṃ.
anya-e0811n:214: Yācito’haṃ kathaṃ nāma, na dajjāmya’pi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0811n:219: Vise siṅgimhi nadiyaṃ, roge rājakulamhi ca.
anya-e0811n:225: Vākyatthato duppatīti, karaṃ gāmmaṃ mataṃ yathā;
anya-e0811n:226: Poso vīriyavā so’yaṃ, paraṃ hantvā na vissamī.
anya-e0811n:248: Taṃ kathaṃ nāma megho’yaṃ, visado sukhaye janaṃ?
anya-e0811n:252: Paṇītopi rasā’peto, cittā me sāmi te gati.
anya-e0811n:258: Pahelikāya paheḷikāya (ka.) māruḷhā, na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā;
anya-e0811n:259: Piyā sukhā’liṅgitaṃ ka, māliṅgati nu no iti.
anya-e0811n:262: Tato yamaka maññaṃ tu, sabba metaṃmayaṃ viya.
anya-e0811n:274: Tantissara virodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ?
anya-e0811n:290: Imā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti nibbharaṃ.
anya-e0811n:312: Sappo sappo! Ayaṃ handa, nivattatu bhavaṃ tato,
anya-e0811n:331: Dunoti kāmacaṇḍālo, so maṃ sadaya niddayo;
anya-e0811n:335: Yato na savanu’bbegaṃ, heṭṭhā yesaṃ vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0811n:339: Desaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, khettaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0811n:361: Nibbāna, bhoga, saggādi, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
anya-e0811n:373: Ocityaṃ nāma viññeyyaṃ, loke vikhyāta mādarā;
anya-e0811n:382: Tiṇāyapi na maññittha, so vo detu jayaṃ jino.
anya-e0811n:393: Pasāda mācare niccaṃ, sajjane saguṇepi ca.
anya-e0811n:423: Dassessaṃ te tato dāni, sadde sambhūsayanti ye.
anya-e0811n:444: Muninda manda sañjāta, hāsa candana limpitā;
anya-e0811n:448: Yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ hotī’ha, sopi ojo’va taṃ yathā.
anya-e0811n:454: Yato puññena te sentu, jina pāda’mbujadvaye.
anya-e0811n:460: Siyā samasuti pubbā, vaṇṇā’vutti paro yathā.
anya-e0811n:463: Tadā pabhuti dhammassa, loke jāto mahu’ssavo.
anya-e0811n:471: Mudūhi vā kevalehi, kevalehi phuṭehi vā,
anya-e0811n:472: Missehi vā tidhā hoti, vaṇṇehi samatā yathā.
anya-e0811n:476: Hadayaṅgamataṃ yāti, sataṃ deti ca nibbutiṃ.
anya-e0811n:490: Caranti sādhū sādhu (sī-chandhānurakkhaṇatthaṃ) sambuddha, kāle keḷiparammukhā.
anya-e0811n:502: Sabandhagāravo so’yaṃ, sileso nāma taṃ yathā.
anya-e0811n:510: Pādambhoja rajo litta, gattā ye tava gotama;
anya-e0811n:511: Aho! Te jantavo yanti, sabbathā nirajattanaṃ.
anya-e0811n:516: Udāro sopi viññeyyo, yaṃ pasattha visesanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:539: Apāṇe pāṇīnaṃ dhammo, sammā ādhīyate kvaci,;
anya-e0811n:547: Uṇṇā puṇṇi’ndunā nātha! Divāpi saha saṅgamā;
anya-e0811n:555: Madhurepi guṇe dhīra, na’ppasīdanti ye tava;
anya-e0811n:560: Disā samantā dhāvanti, kundasobhā sa lakkhaṇā.
anya-e0811n:572: Atisundara maññaṃ tu, kāmaṃ vindati gāmmataṃ.
anya-e0811n:581: Bhāsanto madhuraṃ dhammaṃ, kaṃ na sappīṇaye janaṃ.
anya-e0811n:593: Accantakantā kantā yato accantakantā (ka.) va vuccante te tato’dhunā.
anya-e0811n:599: Līlā vikanti subhago, disā thira vilokano;
anya-e0811n:617: Parivutti, bbhamo, bhāvo, missa, māsī, rasī, iti.
anya-e0811n:619: Ete bhedā samuddiṭṭhā, bhāvo jīvita muccate;
anya-e0811n:620: Vaṅkavuttīsu posesi, sileso tu siriṃ paraṃ.
anya-e0811n:631: Nā’laṃ hantuṃ jine’saṃ tvaṃ, taṇhaṃ taṇhāharopi kiṃ?
anya-e0811n:634: Sadda, tthagammā, vākyattha, visayā,ti ca sā bhidhā.
anya-e0811n:636: Samāsa, paccaye, vā’dī, saddā tesaṃ vasā tidhā;
anya-e0811n:642: Ivādī iva, vā, tulya, samāna, nibha, sannibhā;
anya-e0811n:645: Sarī, sarikkha, saṃvādī, virodhi, sadisā, viya;
anya-e0811n:649: Savaṇṇā, bhā, paṭinidhi, sadhammā, di salakkhaṇā.
anya-e0811n:654: Tassa coreti sobhaggaṃ, tassa kantiṃ vilumpati;
anya-e0811n:657: Kacchaṃ vigāhate, tassa, ta manvetya, nubandhati;
anya-e0811n:681: Khayī cando, bahurajaṃ, padumaṃ, tehi te mukhaṃ;
anya-e0811n:694: Samāsa, ppaccaye, vādi, saddayogaṃ vinā api.
anya-e0811n:720: Uddhaṃ samuggatassā’pi, kiṃ te canda vijambhanā.
anya-e0811n:725: Haṃsī’vā’yaṃ sasī bhinna, liṅgā, kāsaṃ sarāni’va;
anya-e0811n:726: Vijāti vacanā, hīnā, sā’va bhatto bhaṭo’dhipe.
anya-e0811n:735: Karonti cā’daraṃ dhīrā, payoge kvaci de’va tu.
anya-e0811n:738: Piyo pāṇā ivā’yaṃ me, vijjā dhana’miva’ccitā.
anya-e0811n:746: Asesa vatthu visayaṃ, ekadesa vivutti vivatti (ṭīkā), ca;
anya-e0811n:747: Taṃ dvidhā puna paccekaṃ, samāsādivasā tidhā.
anya-e0811n:751: Sirasā na pilandhanti, ke muninda pada’mbujaṃ.
anya-e0811n:754: Ratanāni guṇā bhūrī, karuṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ;
anya-e0811n:766: Sukhaṃ ke vā na vindanti, passantā munino mukhaṃ.
anya-e0811n:776: Rūpakāni bahūnye’va ṭīkāyaṃ uddhaṭaṃ yuttarūpakaṃ sitapupphujalaṃ lola, nettabhiṅga tavā’nanaṃ; kassa nāma mano dhīra, nākaḍḍhati manoharaṃ;, yuttā, yuttādibhedato;
anya-e0811n:783: Natthi yaṃ tena viññeyyaṃ, avutta manumānato.
anya-e0811n:785: Punappuna muccāraṇaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ yaṃ (sī. ka.), yamatthassa, padassa ca;
anya-e0811n:789: Mano harati sabbesaṃ, ādadāti disā dasa;
anya-e0811n:794: Vibhā senti ca sabbāpi, candādīnaṃ hatā viya.
anya-e0811n:797: Jitvā viharati klesa, ripuṃ loke jino ayaṃ;
anya-e0811n:801: Dīpakaṃ nāma taṃ cādi, majjha, ntavisayaṃ tidhā.
anya-e0811n:813: Jinā’nani’ndu indu ca, kassa nā’nandako bhave.
anya-e0811n:817: Taṃ pītihetu, sā cā’yaṃ, passaddhyā’di pasiddhiyā.
anya-e0811n:828: Ekākī’ nekasenaṃ taṃ, māraṃ sa vijayī jino;
anya-e0811n:829: Kathaṃ ta mathavā tassa, pāramībala mīdisaṃ.
anya-e0811n:833: Paṇāmo nanu so ye’va, sakimpi sugate gato.
anya-e0811n:836: Saccaṃ na te gamissanti, sivaṃ sujanagocaraṃ;
anya-e0811n:837: Micchādiṭṭhi parikkanta parikanta (ka.), mānasā ye sudujjanā.
anya-e0811n:844: Tepi lokahitā sattā, sūriyo candimā api;
anya-e0811n:845: Atthaṃ passa gamissanti, niyamo kena laṅghyate.
anya-e0811n:849: Gato’va nibbutiṃ sabbe, saṅkhārā na hi sassatā.
anya-e0811n:852: Jino saṃsārakantārā, janaṃ pāpeti pāpesi (ka.) nibbutiṃ;
anya-e0811n:853: Nanu yuttā gati sā’yaṃ, vesārajja samaṅginaṃ.
anya-e0811n:857: Sayaṃ rāgaparītā hi, pare rañjenti saṅgate.
anya-e0811n:859: Vācce gamme tha vatthūnaṃ, sadisatte pabhedanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:864: Tulyo tva masi bhedo tu, sarīrene’disena te.
anya-e0811n:886: Na hoti khalu dujjanya, mapi dujjanasaṅgame;
anya-e0811n:889: Janako, ñāpako ceti, duvidhā hetavo siyuṃ;
anya-e0811n:896: Munino desanā’yaṃ me, kāmaṃ toseti mānasaṃ.
anya-e0811n:918: Ālāpa hāsa līḷāhi, muninda! Vijayā tava;
anya-e0811n:919: Kokilā kumudāni co, pasevante vanaṃ jalaṃ.
anya-e0811n:924: Pītiyā me samuppannā, santa! Sandassanā tava;
anya-e0811n:925: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, tave’va puna dassanā.
anya-e0811n:952: Vasaṃ nenti’va dhīraṃ taṃ, tadā yogā’bhiyogato.
anya-e0811n:959: Muninda! Pādadvande te, cāru rājiva sundare;
anya-e0811n:962: Maññe, saṅke, dhuvaṃ, nūna, miva, micceva mādihi;
anya-e0811n:963: Sā’yaṃ byañjīyate kvā’pi, kvā’pi vākyena gamyate.
anya-e0811n:967: Pīṇentā jina! Te sādhu, janaṃ sarasataṃ nayuṃ.
anya-e0811n:981: Thutiṃ karoti nindanto, viya taṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:982: Dosā’bhāsā guṇā eva, yanti sannidhi matra hi.
anya-e0811n:985: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha!, Guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ?
anya-e0811n:987: Visesi’cchāyaṃ dabbassa, kriyā, jāti, guṇassa ca;
anya-e0811n:988: Vekalladassanaṃ yatra, viseso nāma yaṃ bhave.
anya-e0811n:990: Na rathā, na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā, na padātayo;
anya-e0811n:994: Na baddhā bhūkuṭi, neva, phurito dasanacchado;
anya-e0811n:995: Mārāribhaṅgaṃ cā’kāsi, muni vīro varo sayaṃ.
anya-e0811n:1003: Na kharaṃ, na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda! Vacanaṃ tava;
anya-e0811n:1011: Puttā me pādasambhattā, sajjā sante’va tādise.
anya-e0811n:1025: Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.
anya-e0811n:1028: Viruddhā, viruddhā, bhinna, kammā, niyamavā, paro;
anya-e0811n:1031: Ocitya samposakādi, sileso, padajā’di padajāti (ka.) pi;
anya-e0811n:1040: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
anya-e0811n:1044: Mano pīṇeti jantūnaṃ, jino vācāya bhāya ca.
anya-e0811n:1062: Sadayo pya’dayo pāpe, cittā’yaṃ munino gati.
anya-e0811n:1069: Saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ, sā matā tulyayogitā.
anya-e0811n:1072: Ubhohi raṃsimālī ca, bhagavā ca tamonudo.
anya-e0811n:1074: Atthantaraṃ sādhayatā, kiñci taṃ sadisaṃ phalaṃ;
anya-e0811n:1075: Dassīyate asantaṃ vā, santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0811n:1090: Purā paraṃ siriṃ vindi, bodhisatto’ bhinikkhamā.
anya-e0811n:1093: Satto sambodhiyaṃ bodhi, satto sattahitāya so;
anya-e0811n:1096: Gopetvā vaṇṇanīyaṃ yaṃ, kiñci dassīyate paraṃ;
anya-e0811n:1097: Asamaṃ vā samaṃ tassa, yadi sā vañcanā matā.
anya-e0811n:1100: Purato na sahassesu, na pañcesu ca tādino;
anya-e0811n:1105: Sampuṇṇo candimā nā’yaṃ, chatta metaṃ manobhuno.
anya-e0811n:1114: Siyā ekāvali sā’yaṃ, dvidhā vidhi, nisedhato.
anya-e0811n:1117: Pādā nakhāli rucirā, nakhāli raṃsi bhāsurā;
anya-e0811n:1123: Nā’layo yo sa jantūnaṃ, nā’nanta byasanā vaho.
anya-e0811n:1125: Yahiṃ bhūsiya bhūsattaṃ, aññamaññaṃ tu vatthunaṃ;
anya-e0811n:1129: Mahantiṃ vindatī kantiṃ, sopi teneva tādisiṃ.
anya-e0811n:1131: Kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa, kriyāya ca, guṇassa ca;
anya-e0811n:1135: Jalanti candaraṃsīhi, samaṃ satthu nakhaṃ savo;
anya-e0811n:1140: Pāpaṃ disā suvimalā, saha sajjana cetasā.
anya-e0811n:1145: Guṇā sabhāva madhurā, api loke’ka bandhuno;
anya-e0811n:1148: Yassa kassa ci dānena, yassa kassa ci vatthuno;
anya-e0811n:1152: Muninā samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsirī muninda! samanuppatto, dāni sabbaññutāsiriṃ (ka.).
anya-e0811n:1155: Saṃsayā’pagataṃ vatthuṃ, yattha so’yaṃ bhamo mato.
anya-e0811n:1161: Yena kenaci vaṇṇena, bhāvo nāmā’ya mīrito.
anya-e0811n:1163: Nanu teye’va santāno, sāgarā na kulācalā;
anya-e0811n:1164: Manampi mariyādaṃ ye, saṃvaṭṭepi jahanti no.
anya-e0811n:1166: Aṅgaṅgi bhāvā sadisa, balabhāvā ca bandhane;
anya-e0811n:1170: Pasatthā munino pāda, nakha raṃsi mahānadī;
anya-e0811n:1171: Aho! Gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
anya-e0811n:1174: Veso sabhāva madhuro, rūpaṃ netta rasāyanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:1175: Madhū’va munino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0811n:1192: Ko nāma passitu malaṃ khalu tāsa mantaṃ.
anya-e0811n:1205: Citta vutti visesā tu, bhāvayanti rase yato;
anya-e0811n:1215: Jigucchā, vimhayo, ceva, samo ca nava ṭhāyino.
anya-e0811n:1219: Ye te caranti sīlena, te honti byabhicārino.
anya-e0811n:1233: Sattikā sātvikā (ka.) pya’nubhāvatte, visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti te.
anya-e0811n:1236: Thambho, paḷaya, romañcā, tathā seda, ssu, vepathu;
anya-e0811n:1239: Yadā ratyādayo bhāvā, ṭhitisīlā na honti ce;
anya-e0811n:1240: Tadā sabbepi te bhāvā, bhavanti byabhicārino.
anya-e0811n:1261: Assādiyatta mānīya, māno ṭhāye’va so raso.
anya-e0811n:1274: Yutyā bhāvānubhāvā te, nibandhā posayanti naṃ;
anya-e0811n:1289: Jeṭṭhe majjhe’dhameti ettha majjhe adhameti padacchedo majjhe’dhame ca kamaso.
